main event: Mrs. Bessie W. Gahn reported observing a luminous object during a bombing flight on September 1, 1952, in Syracuse, N.Y.
interesting points: The object was described as having strong lights underneath, indicating it might have been two small objects., The observation lasted approximately 25 minutes., The witness saw the object on several occasions around 6:45 PM - 7:00 PM., The witness reported that the object hovered silently above the trees before abruptly taking off at high speed., Mrs. Gahn suggested that the Air Force should inform her about what she observed.
sighted object: a luminous object with strong lights underneath
witness description: Mrs. Bessie W. Gahn, a retired female, age 57
